pli-tv-pvr4:5.2_0: Pañcahi āpattikkhandhehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto—
pli-tv-pvr4:8.2_0: Sattahi āpattikkhandhehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto—
pli-tv-pvr4:10.2_0: Buddhe gāravo, dhamme gāravo, saṅghe gāravo, sikkhāya gāravo, appamāde gāravo, paṭisandhāre gāravo—
pli-tv-pvr4:11.2_0: Chahi agāravehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṁ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto—
pli-tv-pvr4:13.2_0: Atthāpatti kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr4:13.3_0: atthāpatti vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr4:13.4_0: atthāpatti kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;

pli-tv-pvr4:13.7_0: atthāpatti kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr4:18.2_0: Idha bhikkhuno mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:18.3_0: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
pli-tv-pvr4:19.1_0: Puna caparaṁ bhikkhuno mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:19.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
pli-tv-pvr4:20.1_0: Puna caparaṁ bhikkhuno mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:20.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
pli-tv-pvr4:21.1_0: Puna caparaṁ bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi tathārūpehi
pli-tv-pvr4:21.1_1: lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī.
pli-tv-pvr4:21.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
pli-tv-pvr4:22.1_0: Puna caparaṁ bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññupasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni,
pli-tv-pvr4:22.1_1: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:22.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
pli-tv-pvr4:23.1_0: Puna caparaṁ bhikkhu yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya
pli-tv-pvr4:23.1_1: diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:23.2_0: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
pli-tv-pvr4:24.2_4: abhāsitaṁ alapitaṁ tathāgatena “bhāsitaṁ lapitaṁ tathāgatenā”ti dīpeti,
pli-tv-pvr4:24.2_5: bhāsitaṁ lapitaṁ tathāgatena “abhāsitaṁ alapitaṁ tathāgatenā”ti dīpeti,
pli-tv-pvr4:38.3_0: Bhikkhu kappiyasaññī saññācikāya kuṭiṁ karoti adesitavatthukaṁ pamāṇātikkantaṁ sārambhaṁ aparikkamanaṁ,
pli-tv-pvr4:38.6_0: bhikkhu kappiyasaññī vikāle bhojanaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:38.7_0: bhikkhu kappiyasaññī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṁ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjati,
pli-tv-pvr4:38.8_0: paṭhamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr4:39.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr4:39.6_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:39.11_0: kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato.
pli-tv-pvr4:39.14_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:40.3_1: Tassa kuṭiṁ karonti adesitavatthukaṁ pamāṇātikkantaṁ sārambhaṁ aparikkamanaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr4:40.6_0: Bhikkhu kappiyasaññī anupasampannaṁ padaso dhammaṁ vāceti, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr4:40.7_0: dutiyena āpattisamuṭṭhānena imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr4:41.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:41.3_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:41.8_0: vācato samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato na cittato.
pli-tv-pvr4:41.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:42.3_0: Bhikkhu kappiyasaññī saṁvidahitvā kuṭiṁ karoti adesitavatthukaṁ pamāṇātikkantaṁ sārambhaṁ aparikkamanaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr4:42.6_0: Bhikkhu kappiyasaññī paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-pvr4:42.7_0: Bhikkhu kappiyasaññī bhikkhuniyā vosāsantiyā na nivāretvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa—
pli-tv-pvr4:42.8_0: tatiyena āpattisamuṭṭhānena imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr4:43.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:43.3_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:43.8_0: kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato.
pli-tv-pvr4:43.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:44.3_0: bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:44.4_0: bhikkhu akappiyasaññī saññācikāya kuṭiṁ karoti adesitavatthukaṁ pamāṇātikkantaṁ sārambhaṁ aparikkamanaṁ,
pli-tv-pvr4:44.7_0: Bhikkhu akappiyasaññī vikāle bhojanaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-pvr4:44.8_0: Bhikkhu akappiyasaññī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṁ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjati,
pli-tv-pvr4:44.9_0: Catutthena āpattisamuṭṭhānena imā cha āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr4:45.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:45.3_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:45.8_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr4:45.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:46.3_0: Bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:46.4_1: Tassa kuṭiṁ karonti adesitavatthukaṁ pamāṇātikkantaṁ sārambhaṁ aparikkamanaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr4:46.7_0: Bhikkhu akappiyasaññī anupasampannaṁ padaso dhammaṁ vāceti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-pvr4:46.8_0: Na khuṁsetukāmo na vambhetukāmo na maṅkukattukāmo davakamyatā hīnena hīnaṁ vadeti,
pli-tv-pvr4:46.9_0: pañcamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena imā cha āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr4:47.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:47.3_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:47.8_0: vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato.
pli-tv-pvr4:47.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:48.3_0: bhikkhu saṁvidahitvā bhaṇḍaṁ avaharati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:48.4_0: bhikkhu akappiyasaññī saṁvidahitvā kuṭiṁ karoti adesitavatthukaṁ pamāṇātikkantaṁ sārambhaṁ aparikkamanaṁ,
pli-tv-pvr4:48.7_0: Bhikkhu akappiyasaññī paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-pvr4:48.8_0: Bhikkhu akappiyasaññī bhikkhuniyā vosāsantiyā na nivāretvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa—
pli-tv-pvr4:48.9_0: chaṭṭhena āpattisamuṭṭhānena imā cha āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr4:49.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr4:49.6_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:49.11_0: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:49.14_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti.
pli-tv-pvr4:64.3_0: bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:64.6_0: attano duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa—

pli-tv-pvr4:65.8_0: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:65.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:67.1_0: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajati …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:67.3_0: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajati—
pli-tv-pvr4:67.8_0: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-pvr4:67.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:68.3_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr4:69.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…

pli-tv-pvr4:74.10_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:74.13_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:75.3_0: Bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:76.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:76.3_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:76.6_0: siyā saṅghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr4:76.8_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr4:76.9_0: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr4:76.10_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:76.13_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:77.3_0: Bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:78.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:78.3_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:78.8_0: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:78.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:79.3_0: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
pli-tv-pvr4:79.6_0: Bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr4:79.7_0: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr4:80.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti …pe…
pli-tv-pvr4:80.3_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr4:80.8_0: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:80.11_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr4:81.1_1: avasesā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr4:81.6_0: Ṭhapetvā satta āpattiyo satta āpattikkhandhe avasesā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ na katamaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr4:81.7_0: Sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ na katamena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā.
pli-tv-pvr4:81.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ na katamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:81.10_0: Sattannaṁ samathānaṁ na katamena samathena sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:81.12_0: Ṭhapetvā satta āpattiyo satta āpattikkhandhe, natthaññā āpattiyoti.
